question: What protein does gene RANBP17 translate into?
cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {id: "RANBP17"})-[:TRANSLATED_INTO]->(p:Protein)
            RETURN p.name AS protein

question: What biological processes involve the protein encoded by gene MGAM?
cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {id: "MGAM"})-[:TRANSLATED_INTO]->(p:Protein)
            MATCH (p)-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]->(bp:Biological_process)
            RETURN collect(DISTINCT bp.name)[0..5] AS processes

question: What pathways involve gene GRN?
cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {id: "GRN"})-[:TRANSLATED_INTO]->(p:Protein)
            MATCH (p)-[:ANNOTATED_IN_PATHWAY]->(pw:Pathway)
            RETURN collect(DISTINCT pw.name)[0..5] AS pathways

question: In which tissues is gene TMEM127's protein expressed?
cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {id: "TMEM127"})-[:TRANSLATED_INTO]->(p:Protein)
            MATCH (p)-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]->(t:Tissue)
            RETURN collect(DISTINCT t.name)[0..5] AS tissues

question: What is the functional pathway of gene WAPL from protein to biological process?
cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {id: "WAPL"})-[:TRANSLATED_INTO]->(p:Protein)
            MATCH (p)-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]->(bp:Biological_process)
            RETURN p.name AS protein, collect(DISTINCT bp.name)[0..3] AS processes
